Package ie.gmit.dip

Class FileIO

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.dip.InputProcesser
ie.gmit.dip.FileIO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOator
public class FileIO extends InputProcesser
Handles all file related input/output and validation tasks. Source for the Word Cloud may come from a file. Also the output is a png file.
Author:
Maire Murphy
